page.title: 05NOW, A GIRL'S LIFE
page.content: In Letham,life is quite busy with school Monday to Friday,Guides on Monday night and at school we have gym,art,music and annual school trips.We have a few clubs eg;modern dancing,Guides,Brownies and Teen Club.At school we enjoy playtime where there is a football pitch,grass and a separate annexe for Classes One and Two.During Summer and Easter we have special clubs run by the Church. The Park has a football pitch,tennis courts also roundabout and swings which are especially popular with the younger members of the community.There are also discos held in Letham every three weeks much to the delight of the teenagers where they show off their modern dancing.Letham is a very interesting place to live,5 miles from Forfar in picturesque countryside.
